products.name: Ethiopia Duromina
products.description: This bombshell of a cup delivers sweet and citrus notes in an incredible, velvety texture.

products.name: Golden Hour Blend
products.description: A new warming and bright blend. Easy drinking any time of day, but especially charismatic when you can stop and sit with it.

products.name: Guatemala Candelaria
products.description: An approachable, all-day, everyday coffee. A classic example of a great Antiguan coffee.

products.name: Colombia El Jordan
products.description: A classic example of a great Colombian coffee. Big, layered, and balanced. Easy drinking, all day long.

products.name: Colombia Nariño Borderlands
products.description: A creamy, viscous coffee from a successful project aimed to revitalize a region.

products.name: Hair Bender
products.description: The sweet, savory blend that started it all, and our most popular coffee. When you die and go to heaven, all the diners serve Hair Bender.

products.name: Mazama X Stumptown Mug
products.description: A Stumptown staff favorite. We worked together with Mazama to create a glaze that reminds us of the unparalleled glory that is hot coffee on a foggy morning.

products.name: French Press (12 Cup)
products.description: If you’re boldly going for it, this is your new best friend. You get the most of everything here–big flavor, body, and mouthfeel.

products.name: Hario V60 Copper Dripper
products.description: With its stainless steel and wavy contours, the Kalita Wave wins over coffee and design enthusiasts alike.

products.name: Mazama X Stumptown Mug
products.description: With its classic design and copper body made to conduct heat evenly, the V60 Copper brewer is perfect for making an exquisite cup of coffee.
